Text:
If you liked this movie, you may want to know that Hedenius' privious movie is also availabel here at TPB. 

It's called Gubben i stugan (The Old Man in the Cottage) and IIRC it shows us the life of an old farmhand,  living alone in a cottage in the forest, without electricity and running water. Same thing, not a words is uttered.

http://thepiratebay.org/search/gubben%20i%20stugan/0/99/200
